original_text: Then the servant went down on his knees in front of the king. He said to the king, “Please, please give me some more time, then I will pay you everything.”
korean_text: 그 종이 엎드려 절하며 이르되 내게 참으소서 다 갚으리이다 하거늘

sentences.original_text: Then the servant went down on his knees
Please, please give me some more time
sentences.korean_translation: 제발, 제발 시간을 조금만 더 주십시오

sentences.original_text: then I will pay you everything
